ygData.subject: RE: Rebreathers...
ygData.msgSnippet: Buy Gnomish Spirits in a tavern in Ak Anon.  Combine the spirits with 1 flask of water in your tinkering box and tada... Firewater. Darkadvent - Cazic-Thule
ygData.messageBody:
Buy Gnomish Spirits in a tavern in Ak'Anon. Combine the spirits with 1
flask of water in your tinkering box and tada... Firewater.

Darkadvent - Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory J. Paul [mailto:gregjpaul@...]
Sent: Monday, December 27, 1999 3:49 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreathers...


From: "Gregory J. Paul" <gregjpaul@...>

I also found the Supplies needed for the rebreather in the 3rd windmill on
Cazic-Thule.
Also one of the high lvls in my guild has see the rebreathers go for
5000pp.FYI
also since I am new where do I find Firewater or how do I make it.
Also is there a web page that is devoted to tinkering.

Dweeb Fire of Cazic-Thule
----- Original Message -----
From: <sragan@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, December 27, 1999 9:36 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreathers...


> From: sragan@...
>
>
> Dont forget to do a "/feedback" and tell Verant they need to reduce the
weigh of the lungs and rebreathers.
>
> As I figured, after I maxed on stalking probes at 102, I had to cycle
about 40,000 plat thru the skill to get to the point where rebreathers can
be made with a tolerable success rate.
>
> My skill is 127 at the moment and my success rate for rebreathers is 1 out
of 3. I am trying to sell them for 3250 on tunare.
>
> Cheers FizzWizz
>
> P.S. To the guy that asked where all the component are for the lungs and
rebreathers, check in the back of the necro guild in akanon, you should find
a vendor in there somewhere...heh-heh...
>
> >
